summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Polling Winner MVP. Backend APIs 93.8% success rate (15/16 tests passed). All major frontend flows working including user registration/login, poll voting with Cashfree payment integration, admin panel, KYC workflow, and wallet system.

minor_bugs.impact: Admin cannot view/modify payment gateway and withdrawal charge settings

passed_tests: Poll details page with voting options
Cashfree payment integration - successful redirect to sandbox
Admin login and dashboard with stats
Admin create poll form with all fields
User profile management with KYC status
Wallet page with balance and withdrawal options
My Polls page showing voting history
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin settings API endpoint returning 520 error. All other features are working correctly.

success_percentage.integration: 100% (Cashfree payment, user flows, admin flows all working)
